changes.description:
Added `smithy-jmespath`, a dependency-less, JMESPath parser with a rich AST
that can be used in code generation, and performs static analysis of
expressions.

Added `smithy-waiters`, containing the `@waitable` trait. This provides
information that clients can use to poll until a desired state is reached, or
it is determined that state cannot be reached.

Added `smithy-aws-cloudformation-traits`, containing several (unstable) traits
that indicate CloudFormation resources and the additional metadata about their
properties.

Added `smithy-aws-cloudformation`, containing the (unstable) "cloudformation"
build tool that, given a model decorated with traits from
`aws.cloudformation`, will generate CloudFormation Resource Schemas.
Added support for `patternProperties` when generating JSON Schema.
Added more utility methods to the `CodeWriter`.
Added validation for `@sensitive` trait when applied to members.

Added support for retrieving full paths to the `outputToken` and `items`
pagination members.
Added a warning for `@enum` entries without names.
Added support for generating an `integer` OpenAPI type.
Improved `smithy-diff` evaluation of changing member targets.
Updated pagination tokens to support being `map` shapes.

Fixed a bug where URIs would be declared conflicting if the differed through
the `@endpoint` trait.

Fixed a bug that would allow the `@aws.auth#sigv4` trait's `name` property to
be empty.
Updated protocol tests for `@sparse` trait.
Fixed a bug with the interaction of `CodeWriter.writeInline` with sections.
Fixed links for protocol test suites.
Added example and test for composing with `CodeWriter`.
Clarified that `@enum` values cannot be empty.
Clarified binary data in protocol tests.
Lowered severity of validation that a `pageSize` member is marked `@required`.
